import React from 'react' import { mdx } from '@mdx-js/react' /* @jsx mdx */ import Post from "@/components/Post" import { waynedahlberg } from "@/authors"; import image1 from "./ia-writer-working-copy.jpg"; import image2 from "./nextjs-tailwind-vercel.jpg"; export { getStaticProps } from "@/getStaticProps"; export const meta = { title: `Hello World ðŸ‘‹`, description: `This is the first post of my blog.`, date: "2020-11-02T19:00:00.000Z", authors: [waynedahlberg], discussion: "https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/discussions/2511" }; const makeShortcode = name => function MDXDefaultShortcode(props) { console.warn("Component " + name + " was not imported, exported, or provided by MDXProvider as global scope") return
}; const layoutProps = { meta }; const MDXLayout = (props) => export default function MDXContent({ components, ...props }) { return

{`This blog is a long time coming. The rise of social media has largely eplaced the desire for self-publishing on the web. This is my attempt to recapture that desire, build my writing skills. I'm also noticing friends and peers firing up their own blogging engines. So with this post I am turning the ignition to `}{`START`}{`.`}

Details

Wordpress and Medium were out. This blog had to build from the ground up using simple, extensible tools, and look good in the process. 

{`

`}

{`Blog details`}

  • {`Development`}{`: Built using `}{`Next.js`}{`, along with `}{`Tailwind CSS`}{`.`}
  • {`Deployment`}{`: Updated via Github Pages, then auto-deployed on the `}{`Vercel`}{` platform.`}
  • {`Content`}{`: Created in Markdown with `}{`IA Writer`}{`, pushed via git with `}{`Working Copy`}{`.`}

{`Obligatory first post out of the way... See you next time.`}
